posts.title: React
posts.body: React makes it painless to create interactive UIs. Design simple views for each state in your application, and React will efficiently update and render just the right components when your data changes. Declarative views make your code more predictable and easier to debug.

posts.title: JavaScript
posts.body: JavaScript (JS) is a lightweight, interpreted, or just-in-time compiled programming language with first-class functions. While it is most well-known as the scripting language for Web pages, many non-browser environments also use it, such as Node.js, Apache CouchDB and Adobe Acrobat.

posts.title: Node.js
posts.body: Build server-side apps faster with integrated Node.js support and developer tools. Create, edit, run, debug, test, and maintain your Node.js apps with less effort. Free 30-day trial. Tech support by JetBrains. Windows, Linux, macOS. Types: Developer Tools, JavaScript Tools.
